nodes.bodyText: Same here. Build Map/List structure and serialize using Utils.getDefaultJsonFactory().
Can you use GenericJson here instead of Map<String, Object>? If possible, that might clean up lot of the generic warnings that result from these casts.

I think you've suggested the same thing before, but when I try to cast to GenericJson I get compile errors:
	at com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseUserManagerTest.testCreateSamlProviderAsync(FirebaseUserManagerTest.java:1988)```
